notes: NYC municipal workers. ~60 locals covering different agencies. Data exists in unions_master as 'STATE COUNTY AND MUNI EMPLS AFL-CIO' (f_num=59403, 121K members) but not surfaced as named entity. Locals include 372 (paraprofessionals), 768 (health), 1549 (clerical), 420 (hospitals), 983 (motor vehicle), 1407 (finance), 2627 (IT), 375 (engineers), 2507 (EMS), 1930 (library), 2054 (CUNY assistants).
NYC teachers and paraprofessionals. Exists in unions_master (f_num=63924, 196K) but not in manual_employers. NYSUT entry (467K) in DB encompasses UFT membership. Largest AFT local in the country.

SUNY faculty and professional staff across 29 campuses. Found in mv_employer_search as employer ('United University Professions' in Latham with CWA affiliation) but not tracked as public sector union. 32 chapters.

Upstate NY and Hudson Valley municipal workers. 80+ locals covering Erie County (Local 1095), Rochester city (Local 1635), Buffalo (Locals 264/650), Rochester schools (BENTE Local 2419). Genuine gap - not tracked anywhere.
CUNY faculty and professional staff (AFT Local 2234). Found in F7 as employer but not as public sector union entity. Research Foundation of CUNY references PSC-CUNY in mv_employer_search.
NYCHA caretakers, housing assistants, heating plant technicians (~8K), plus school safety, housing police, traffic enforcement, CUNY security. Genuine gap - not tracked.
NYC Department of Sanitation workers. Genuine gap - not tracked.
SUNY graduate student employees (TAs, RAs). Genuine gap - not tracked.
Law enforcement supervisors, county correction units, municipal law enforcement, security supervisors. Genuine gap - not tracked.

NY State Professional Fire Fighters Association. 110+ locals including Buffalo (282), Rochester (1071), Yonkers (628), Utica (32). Only 5 filings (8.4K) in unions_master and 7 locals in ps_union_locals (20.9K). Individual locals not granularly tracked.

Amalgamated Transit Union locals: 282 (Rochester/RGRTA), 580 (Syracuse/Centro), 1321 (Albany/CDTA), 1342 (Buffalo/NFTA), 1625 (Buffalo), plus 7 more. Only 1 filing (1.7K) in unions_master. Individual locals not tracked.
NY Power Authority skilled craft workers. Local 2104 (Lewiston/Niagara, 212 members), Local 2032 (Massena/St Lawrence, 350 members). Not found in mv_employer_search.
